items.question: IA.L1-B.1.V - Identification
Notes / Evidence
items.value: All users identified using first name + last name.

items.question: Service Account Management
Do you have a device inventory spreadsheet?

items.codingInstructions: Manage service accounts carefully by assigning minimal privileges and regularly reviewing their usage to prevent misuse.
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Manage service accounts carefully by assigning minimal privileges and regularly reviewing their usage to prevent misuse.

items.question: Device Inventory
items.codingInstructions: Maintain an up-to-date list of all devices connected to the network to track and manage authorized hardware
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Maintain an up-to-date list of all devices connected to the network to track and manage authorized hardware

extension.valueString: Any additional notes, remediation plans, or implementation challenges...

items.codingInstructions: Identify information system users, processes acting on behalf of users, or devices.
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Identify information system users, processes acting on behalf of users, or devices.

items.question: IA.L1-B.1.VI - Authentication
Notes / Evidence
items.value: Username and password, Multi-factor authentication (MFA), Smart cards/PIV cards

items.question: Password Requirements
items.codingInstructions: Set and enforce strong password rules to ensure users and processes securely verify their identity before accessing systems.
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Set and enforce strong password rules to ensure users and processes securely verify their identity before accessing systems.

answers.text: Yes, for all users and systems

value.text: Yes, for all users and systems

answers.text: Users required to change on first login

items.question: Authentication Failure Handling
Number of failed attempts before lockout:

items.codingInstructions: Implement procedures to detect, respond to, and limit the impact of failed authentication attempts to protect against unauthorized access.
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Implement procedures to detect, respond to, and limit the impact of failed authentication attempts to protect against unauthorized access.

extension.valueString: Any additional notes, remediation plans, or implementation challenges...

items.codingInstructions: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of those users, processes, or devices, as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational information systems.
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of those users, processes, or devices, as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational information systems.
